meaningMnemonic: The radical for <radical>courage</radical> and the kanji for <kanji>courage</kanji> are exactly the same.
readingMnemonic: A man needs <kanji>courage</kanji> to stand up to all the <reading>you</reading>ths (ゆう) of the world. They are so numerous and difficult to understand, but the man can face them with courage thanks to his mama.
